mapper.select: select d.doc_id, d.doc_status_id, d.emp_id, d.doc_type_id, d.doc_subject, d.doc_content, d.doc_date, d.doc_deadline, d.doc_open, d.doc_dep_id, d.doc_note, e.emp_name, r.expense_info_id, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.btrip_location from document d, employee e, btrip_report r where d.emp_id = e.emp_id and d.doc_id = a.doc_id and d.doc_id = #{doc_id}
